org.apache.gearpump.streaming.task

Class TaskActor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.gearpump.streaming.task.TaskActor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    akka.actor.Actor, ExpressTransport, TimeOutScheduler

    public class TaskActor
extends java.lang.Object
implements akka.actor.Actor, ExpressTransport, TimeOutScheduler
    All tasks of Gearpump run inside an Actor. TaskActor is the Actor container for a task.
